title: Exploring Issues of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion in Relation to Human Biology
description: This course will examine diversity, equity, and inclusion beginning with a biological framework. Focus will be on how underlying biological differences have been used to support bias and prejudice against particular groups such as women, African Americans, and Latinos. This course is approved to meet the campus Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) requirement.  Prerequisites: BILD 1 and BILD 2 or BILD 3.
